website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you value portability, but other models offer more bells and whistles for a similar price.
pros: Ultra-lightweight, portable model that attaches with a clamp
cons: Lacks the features and dimming options of other products
Clamp doesn't provide a secure hold on all surfaces

customer_reviews.title: First Rate Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this lamp so much I ordered the desktop version. First, concerns about brightness were totally dispensed when I first turned it on. The brightest setting is enough to do surgery by. The touch control works flawlessly and perhaps I won't have to deal with switch failure down the road. Amazingly the clamp is metal, not plastic. Measured watt usage and got 2-5-10 watts with each of the three settings. Quality of materials and build are self evident. The neck will not rotate much, but bends nicely. The only improvement might be to make the head itself able to rotate from the neck for superior positioning. The diffuser and color temperature are spot on. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Versatile daylight temperature lamp of medium brightness
customer_reviews.text: A very nice quality lamp that while not particularly bright, is sufficient to provide good illumination of the immediate work area surrounding my keyboard and desktop. I suspect I'd favor the brighter 11W version with adjustable color temperature but went with this 9W version to save a few dollars, given I already have a brighter desk lamp available should I need it. The clamp is indeed strong enough to support the light panel with virtually any placement, and is a great alternative to the larger "engineers' light" with a screw-down clamp. .Color temperature is unimportant for me as long as a daylight temperature lamp is available, which is another reason I chose this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: DPTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: 30 day return policy isn’t long enough - Update!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this light for about a month and a half. The arm of the light is starting to get flimsy. I’m not thrilled about the fact that I am not able to return anything if I have just had it thirty days. **Update** I wrote this review without reading the description very well. The company has a warranty on the light. I didn’t realize that when I wrote the review. The company contacted me and offered to send me a new light. I am very impressed with their customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: LEAH T HILTON

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you have a place to clip it.
customer_reviews.text: I received the newer updated unit. There is a sensor on top of the light. Tap to turn on. Tap to change brightness. Touch for 2 seconds to turn off. Works great. Nice, bright and evenly dispersed light. I use it over my benchtop metal lathe and leave it set on high (it remembers the last setting when you turn it on). The dimming feature would be useful if it was being used as a reading light. It's a clip light, so you need to have something to clip it to where you want to use it. Only have a week of use on it, so can't comment on durability but the construction seems good.
customer_reviews.author: spinningwood

customer_reviews.title: Great light for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great light for the price. Only complaint is that the clamp isn't very strong so when you bend the light in any way the clamp will slide or slip off whatever it's clamped to. Light is bright with a bluish colored natural light that does not feel like it hurts your eyes and puts off very little heat. I bought it to use while I paint and it works well other than having to reclamp it anytime I move the light around or else it will fall over. I love the touch-activator, it makes for a quick light adjustment. Overall great product and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Breezy561

customer_reviews.title: Super Great Light in all respects.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic light. Couldn't be any better. Oh, wait, there's the TROND Halo 11W-C LED Clamp Light Desk Lamp with USB Charging Port, etc., etc., etc. That's just too much. Clamp holds well, light brightness and diffusion are great. Perfect on/off switch (though it took me an embarrassing while to find it). Easily positioned without disturbing clamp and stays in place the first time. Looks great (except for the clamp, but hey, it's a clamp). I got it for $25 and find it well worth it. Might hesitate at $60. Improvements? Maybe a very, very low setting to use as a night light? That's outside its purpose but it's so good I want to multi task it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I wish it would tap off just like it taps on
customer_reviews.text: If there was one thing I could change, I wish it would tap off just like it taps on, and the press and hold were for dimming it. Honestly, I would rather tap it through all the brightness levels than to have to do the press and hold every time I want to turn it off. After all, that is how every other touch lamp I've used works. The press and hold is annoying because you have to press so long. Other than that, it is a great lamp. Love the clip, and the long flexible arm. The touch works well, but I wish the touch sensitive area were a bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: C. Drake

customer_reviews.title: TROND lamp - attentive customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update: After posting this review I was promptly contacted by TROND customer service. They explained that the switch button was updated so that now a long tap switches the lamp off. I was offered and received a refund. The lamp has for switch positions. Three for different brightness and one to switch the lamp off. The off switch is not working unfortunately, and it is not possible to power lamp off via switch. In addition the lamp doesn’t stay in place when clipped. This is our 2nd purchase of this brand and the 1 st lamp is of better quality. I would have returned this product but don’t wish to strain the system now ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely Overrated
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for over a year. Here’s the real deal about it. The light isn’t very bright even on the highest setting. I’d estimate it to give off about 800 lumens maximum. Any claim it provides more is untrue. (And yes I know there are three light settings on it.) Furthermore the light is quite blue and cold looking. It’s not a good “daylight” light source despite the claims. I purchased 2 of them for my art easel. My experiment was a flop. I’m back to searching for a good light. In all, they’re fine if you are looking for not a very bright light or something simple for a tool shop or such.
customer_reviews.author: straightforward

customer_reviews.title: Overheated and died
customer_reviews.text: Overheated and died the night before the 30 day return policy was up. It was exactly what I needed, good design, easy install, if only it wouldn't have burned out and died? Amazon, as usual, easy return and refund. Now I just need to find an adequate replacement.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Using to light up hard to light area on my sewing machine
customer_reviews.text: This came well packed. I plugged it in and it worked. Being LED, it is very bright. I bought 2, one to "spotlight" the front of my sewing machine where it tends to be in shadow and a second to use elsewhere. I have a nice floor lamp that lights up the back of my machine and rest of my sewing table so I will use this to bend and get to the front of my machine without being too much in my way.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Durable, Fantastic: Stop shopping around and just get this one
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these for over a year. It has held up without an issue, and can be varied from dim to very, very bright. The lighting is even, but the light itself is built unusually well; all of the other clip lights I have gotten have either failed, broken, fallen apart, and so on. This light is superb, strong, very well made, durable, versatile, and very reasonably priced. Now with puppies on the way I have medical monitoring equipment near the whelping box in an area without illumination, so I bought a second light for that area, and I trust this light to also be SAFE. I'd give this product six stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Animal Doctor

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the remote learning setup for our kids and seems to be a good value for money. Super bright on highest setting. 3 levels of brightness is definitely useful. Adjustability of the lamp arm is great and its very stiff so it will stay in pretty much any position. Clamp came with a weird bedazzled cloth thing on it that isn't shown in any pictures and I'm not sure what function it serves. Clamp is strong but because of the way its designed if clamping to a thinner desk it can be a little wobbly and not feel super sturdy when adjusting the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Bedside Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This light is perfect for reading in bed – three light settings, accessible with a tap – send a bright, white focused light on my book while allowing my husband to sleep in relative darkness beside me. The extra long neck makes it easy to position no matter where I have it clamped. Words can't express how happy I am with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: V. Sowell

customer_reviews.title: Quality light for reading.
customer_reviews.text: Just received item. Great packaging. The light is well-made, including the goose neck. Power cord is long. Dimmer feature is awesome: provides just the right amount of light for me to take notes on paper while using laptop. The neck is quite long and stiff enough to stay where it is positioned. I used the clamp to mount it vertically on desk with no trouble.

customer_reviews.title: I boutht two of these and love them. Just ordered a third one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine first and loved it and then my husband wanted one so I ordered him one. Now I needed a 3rd one for my painting easel so I just ordered another one. They are very nice and has 3 settings. There is another one that has 5 settings but its 10.oo more so I decided to just get another of these since it does everything I want. IT clamps to the easel nice and also clamps to my husbands desk nice. Its great lighting for a desk or spot lighting. Now its not enough to light an entire room but for the computer or reading or painting and sewing this one is a good one. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Curenton

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this light. The packaging was incredible, you would have thought they were sending very high end electronics. Well made. Touch the top and you have three levels of illumination in a cool bluish light. The clip is large and well made and the flexible neck is quite strong and easily hold the lamp head in just about any position. It was purchased for my lathe but never made it because when I was testing it on my desk it suddenly found a permanent home. Guess I'll have to buy another for the lathe, and maybe one for my work table, and one for my...
customer_reviews.author: kris stadelman

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This was my second unit i purchased. Unfortunately the unit was defective and wouldn't turn off so I had to return it. The first one was fantastic. Bright light, sleek and space savvy. If you get one that actually works, its a great buy. Update: So Trond contacted me regarding my review. They are very customer service oriented. They sent me a replacement unit which is an upgraded model which works flawlessly. Because they have showed that it matters that their customers are satisfied, I have updated my review and have been telling everyone if they need a LED this is the brand and company to get it from. Thanks TROND
customer_reviews.author: AMACam

customer_reviews.title: The right one - well made!
customer_reviews.text: After spending hours looking at overhead bed lights; I'm delighted to say that this one is exactly what I wanted. The neck is easy to wrap around to the desired position, and the clamp is large enough to clip onto the headboard without any problem. The touch mechanism for 3 light intensities is great, and the rectangular bulb covers the right area for reading in bed. This light may cost a bit more but, it's well made, easy to use, and looks quite durable. If you don't need to use batteries, then spending a the few extra bucks for this quality product is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Bought the second one
customer_reviews.text: Had one since 2018. Took it on intercontinental trips, abused a little... Touch button responsive, neck strong but flexible. Clamp is not super strong, but most are flimsy in this category/type, anyway. Add small C- clamp on top of this if you want it absolutely secured in place. Recently got the second one, still nothing more functional and better than this (in its power range, of course)... The cable could be longer, but that's solvable as well:-)
customer_reviews.author: Ugljesa Mileta

customer_reviews.title: Great reading light
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a night reading light for my daughter. And liked it so much bought another for the other daughter. The clip is strong and stays put. The illumination is great, however the brightest setting is very, very bright - almost blinding. The dimmest is the only setting we need for reading just before bedtime. My only complaint is the gooseneck is a bit stiff and when bending at a tight angle does not stay and moves the clip off if its mounting. I had to tie back the gooseneck to keep it where I wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Light position is important
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a desk lamp to supplement the overhead and natural light in my office. The light itself works great, but you'll find that positioning your lamp is very important. The lamp itself is flat on the bottom with no lip around the edges which means if you are positioning it above eye level you will be looking directly into the bright light and dealing with glare. If positioned below eye level, the light is great. I was a bit surprised at how warm (on highest setting) this light gets to the touch for an LED.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp. I’m using it for detailed pedicure work in my nail business and it’s wonderful for the task. I also love that it clips on to a variety of surfaces of varying widths really sturdily. The one thing I wasn’t crazy about, however, is how the lamp was shipped to me. I received it in the completely unsecured original product package. It just had a shipping label slapped on it. It wasn’t taped closed or shipped inside another, secured box. Still, the product itself warrants 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Da Gull

customer_reviews.title: Great for drawing
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional pencil artist and needed an upgrade from my lamp on my drawing table. I am surprised how high of quality this is for the low price. I was worried about the brightness of the LEDs, but they are actually brighter than my original lamp bulb. The light feels natural too. The only adjustment I've had to make is getting used to the head of the lamp being closer to my paper. At first I thought it was "in my face", but I've adjusted to it and it doesn't bother me now.
customer_reviews.author: NebraskaMamaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Like this a bunch for bench work!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. The light seems a lot warmer than most LED's I've used. The gooseneck bends easy and stays put and the clip is strong enough to hold it steady. I'm using it over my workbench where it clips to a shelf and I love that I can move it from one side to the other quickly and bring it down to where I need it. The touch on/off is a real bonus as I can always turn it on or brighten with just a finger tap.
customer_reviews.author: 2home

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table lamp especially for hobby use.
customer_reviews.text: I can only praise this product. It is perfect for my hobby needs. Three brightness levels. Great 5K+ color temperature. No heat, even when working in very close proximity to lamp. Excellent consistent illumination pattern. Very stable base clamp. on/off/brightness settings all with a single "touch" sensor, well designed flexible arm. The high 5 star praises this lamp has received are indeed very well deserved.
customer_reviews.author: MJD in SM CA

customer_reviews.title: It’s been about six years...still works!
customer_reviews.text: I got this a few years ago, still works perfectly. The ONLY thing that maybe bothers me a little, is that the top of the lamp got sticky over time. I’m not sure if it’s due to the tropical climate, or that I had been cleaning it with Lysol wipes. And it does have a high pitched noise if you get too close to it. But I’m sensitive with those frequencies. I don’t know if everyone would be able to hear it. Even so, it’s worked wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: ¢¾

customer_reviews.title: Great Side Light, with some exciting Odd twist.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lamp because the description said "Extra long neck" or Arm / reach something to that affect. Well its just like any other and to add its just has hard to maneuver around. The three brightness setting I love, but having then to press hold to turn it off is hard. You have to hold the same tiny spot on top to turn it off well guess i slowly wanted to lower my light every time I turned it off! oh well it works its slim , it add light to dark and the clamp holds just fine and yes JUST fine for now. I would say its been fun learning my lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Where has this little Gem been hiding
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my hobby work surface. Truly a nice adjustable soft and even distributed light. No glaring light and awful annoying shadows. Three brightness settings, I prefer setting three (brightest) and has a memory touch setting. Very cool. I hope this little Gem has some longevity as It is perfect for my needs. I would purchase this again without any hesitation as of this review. Hope you feel the someway if you order one. Best wishes - stay healthy. Robert P. Florence, AZ
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: The lights are excellent. I have two now and thinking about a ...
customer_reviews.text: The lights are excellent. I have two now and thinking about a third. They clap tight with no problems. I love the different levels of light for every circumstance. There is only a slight amount of heat of them. The seller was supportive with a letter after I received my package. Shipping was fast and packed very well. Thanks. I will buy again and defiantly recommend. One note of a suggestion to the manufacturer. The neck of this light is longer then others and I can't imagine it being any shorter. If anything 4 to 5 inches longer would be great.
customer_reviews.author: D & G

customer_reviews.title: very bright, very versatile
customer_reviews.text: My workspace has no lighting at all. 0. Zilch. It's literally a box constructed inside of a warehouse. This is the only source of illumination and it's bright enough to serve both as general ambient lighting when pointed upwards, and task lighting when twisted down towards the task. The next model should have a separate on off switch as the single switch serves as both an intensity control and an on-off toggle when held down for a number of seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Howard G.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Lathe users who have a rotating drive head
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my lathe. I had trouble before being able to see inside my bowls when I was trying to hollow it out. Before I was using magnetic lights but they kept getting in the way of my tool and when I rotated the head stock to make it comfortable for me to turn, I couldn't use them at all. With this light I can set it over the top where I can see without it interfering with my tool, that way I can be comfortable and still get the job finished.
customer_reviews.author: Glen A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I Would Not Buy This Again
customer_reviews.text: I have a few different lights similar to this, and this is the worst of them all. To start with, the clamp is not nearly strong enough, and I'm constantly trying to adjust it. Bought it for my wife as a reading light to use in bed, and even on the lowest setting, it's so bright that it keeps me awake. So, I bought a different reading light and brought this it into my shop. That's where I found out that it won't stay in place with that clamp. The head and the gooseneck seem to be too heavy to hold it in place and it's always falling over. Buy a different light.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: VERY HIGH QUALITY LIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for my office needs. I was very surprised at how well made this light is. The goose-neck is thick, with a nice rubber-like coating, and bends easily, yet remains firm once positioned. I love the bright white light it produces and there are several brightness levels. It works by touch, so there are no switches to wear out. I would buy another in a second!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Yaksich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light as I was just starting my eyelash/microblading service. I had not invested in a neewer ring light or glamcor. I would clip this on the wooden end of my massage table and it would provide PERFECT lighting. It is touch activated and has 3 levels. It does not get hot and is very light weight. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tameka Branch

customer_reviews.title: Great for projects
customer_reviews.text: I like this lamp so much I bought a second one and gave it to my college-bound kid. I'll probably buy another. The neck is flexible enough but stays put. The light is diffuse enough to not project any hard shadows that obscure tiny details in small projects. Also good for snapping photos of documents. The brightest setting is brighter than necessary for most tasks, so that's good. The tiniest complaint is that holding the touch sensor to turn it off takes about a half-second longer than you'd expect, so you just start wondering whether you've touched it in the right place when it turns off.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: very bright love it!
customer_reviews.text: i used it to light up my darkroom area whenever I'm at my computer everyday and i work from home. clamp is weak, it is not as strong and it will slides down on the side of my work shelf on top of my desk. i would have given it a 5 stars. Brightness is awesome and I've have been using a daylight led lamps all these years and It's the best one yet also, touch buttons for the brightness setting and on/off switch are easy to reach. very nice lamp! thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lahree

customer_reviews.title: ... at a garage sale with this one and I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old architects articulated clamp light that I bought at a garage sale with this one and I like it very much. The light is not as amber as incandescent bulbs, but that is actually nice. I use it at my desk constantly as a task light. It is clamped to an overhead shelf edge. The gooseneck is stiff enough that it stays in place very nicely, and doesn't sag. it is easy to adjust the brightness by touching the back (3 levels of brightness). If this lasts 50,000 hours, it will be a mind-boggling value.
customer_reviews.author: Gozzard

customer_reviews.title: awesomely bright light
customer_reviews.text: Bought lamp for my 91 year old mother with macular degeneration. She still tries to read and work puzzles, but lighting has been an issue. I tried several other lamps, but this one was the only one bright enough with large enough light coverage. I love that it is portable and the gooseneck moves easily. The gooseneck is long and high enough to move out of the way. Awesome lamp. I only wish the on/off button were raised to be easier for her to turn off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Floridasunshine

customer_reviews.title: Good for some not for me
customer_reviews.text: To be honest the clip that holds this isn't very secure if it not perpendicular to to the table. The table i need it for has its only available surface to clamp pointing down meaning gravity is against it. this means that bumping it can cause it to fall over or slip off. Sadly I'm gonna have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: KaineVillante

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality, broke after 12 months
customer_reviews.text: 12 month Update: Broke after 10 months, we had to wiggle or hit it to get it to turn on. Then it finally went kapoot after 11-12 months. Another chinese made poorly manufactured product. Sad that we live in this disposable society. Original Review: Great build quality, light is too cold for me. 5800K ~ 6000K (daylight) ... certainly not blue, but certainly not warm and inviting light a bed light I was imaging. Part of this is my fault for not studying the lighting color before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: David Cardiff

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Great Project Work Light for 3D Printer
customer_reviews.text: These lamps have a strong spring clip and stiff goose neck. Once positioned, it stays. For years, I have used two to illuminate the work surface on a Sherline CNC mill. The lamp produces a bright, even illumination. Often, the lamps will be on for hours at a time. Never had one fail. I recently purchased a third lamp to illuminate the work surface of an Ender 3 Pro 3D printer. It is working just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: DTBarber

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic light, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have used this item for many months now. It’s perfect. I do eyelash extensions for a living, and this light has gotten me through all of my appointments with zero issue. The cord is a decent length, the brightest setting is perfect and not completely blinding, the clip has worked with a massage table and a recliner, the gooseneck is nice and long and easy to maneuver, the clip also is sturdy enough that it doesn’t slide around. The only thing I would say is that the clip would not work for a thin surface. You want whatever you’re clipping it onto to have some thickness to it. Probably at least an inch or two.
customer_reviews.author: Serena S.

customer_reviews.title: Much brighter than the circle lamps
customer_reviews.text: I bought two clamp-style lamps to see which would work better on my adjustable bed. This lamp was the clear winner. It had a longer adjustable arm, which made it better for reaching toward the book. It has more LEDs, and is much brighter. Look at the pictures to compare the two lights on their brightest settings. The whiter page is this lamp, which I kept, returning the other, circle-style lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: For My New Desk!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to clamp on the new drafting table I purchased a couple of months ago, and it's ideal. If I had initially read the directions, I would have realized that it turns on and off by touch. No need to search for the nonexistent switch. It is daylight bright without the annoying blue cast that you often see on daylight lamps and it keeps everything on the desk a true color. Happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: I. KingTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Good fill light for streaming
customer_reviews.text: With more people doing remote work during the Human Malware crisis, lighting is getting more and more scarce. My kiddo asked for a light ring or light so she wouldn't have to close her curtains every time she turned video on. This was the most economical choice that included a bendy neck and it's super easy to use. Since there's no physical switch to break, this light should last us a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Mango Cafe

customer_reviews.title: No off switch
customer_reviews.text: It's a OK light but the arm that holds it isn't very strong and it's certainly NOT going to stay where you put it. You probably need to put a cloth around the clamp if you are using it to attach to anything nice. edit: Ok, there were no instructions but you hold your finger on the top of the lamp to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty handy light to have clipped onto the edge of ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty handy light to have clipped onto the edge of your desk! It has a nice long gooseneck. I can't find one fault with the thing, aside from thinking, as with any light, I would like it to be even brighter. Honestly, it's plenty bright for detailed tasks. I do some soldering and other things that require good lighting, and this light has made my life much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sunbot

customer_reviews.title: Bright And Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is nice and bright enough to really light up my sewing area on my sewing machine. It's clamps securely and easily on to my dinner tray that holds my sewing machine. The long arm is great because it fits over the front of my machine directing the light perfectly. This is a great purchase if you need a clamp on light for sewing, reading, painting etc.
customer_reviews.author: Latia H

customer_reviews.title: 3 settings, not dimmable
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to read the small text in my coding books. I wanted something that can get really bright and that I can move to different desks and tables with not too much trouble. The clamp design and 3 levels of brightness work great for my needs. The clamp holds the lamp securely and the gooseneck is pretty stiff so it never droops once it's adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: S. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Hard to operate
customer_reviews.text: Light is ok and the clip is strong but its hard to reach up and turn it on/off without looking at it. The switch/touch sensor is near the middle of the top and you have to hunt for it, zero tactile feedback. I want something I can operate if I'm in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Im very pleased with this Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I started to paint war game miniatures and I realized right away that having a good light makes life easier mostly when you prime your miniatures using black, I found a page where someone was rating the best low cost daylight lamps for miniature painting, this one was one of the best ones, so I gave it a try and Im very pleased with the product... the light is perfect, the 3 levels of lightning can be used according to your needs...
customer_reviews.author: Kefka

customer_reviews.title: Narrow light cone, but decent enough for drafting table.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a clip light for my drafting table and this works alright. The light doesn't spread as wide as I hoped so it doesn't seem as bright. I like the long neck extending the light higher and not shine so close to the tabletop. I would prefer a simple click to turn in on/off and adjust the levels rather having to hold it down to turn it off. It also does get a bit hot, but less than cheaper lights I've tried. You might need two to fully light up a table.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: This Gooseneck lamp puts light where I want it
customer_reviews.text: Many times, the lamps on end tables or overhead lamp are NOT in the best location for reading a book. - but wtih this goose neck I can clamp it to a vomputer or table top and get the light into a grea tplace for reading a book in a more comfortable position
customer_reviews.author: Steven Reiser

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, simple controls
customer_reviews.text: Task lighting for music stand, very bright light worked well. Like the controls - quick tap cycles through 3 levels of brightness,long tap turns it off. Clamp moves around a bit on 1" shelf, hasn't fallen off. Gooseneck stiff to move, afraid I'm going to break it twisting it to angle I want, but so far so good.
